title: SPACIOUS APARTMENT HOMES
posting_body: Welcome to your new home at Eagle's Brooke in Locust Grove, GA!
This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1519 Sq.
Eagle's Brooke invites you to start your new Locust Grove lifestyle.
Find yourself embracing an apartment community that is full of endless opportunities for entertainment, and relaxation.
Our apartments for rent in Locust Grove, give you the perfect combination of comfort at home, and convenience to be out on the town.
Here you'll find stunning features and a spectacular location.
We offer 1, 2, & 3-bedroom floor plans that bring you everything you need at your fingertips.
Come home to our Locust Grove apartments, and experience the first-hand comfort, and amenities built just for you.
Dive into life at a location that is nestled near all of the top local attractions.
Our Locust Grove apartments for rent will bring you the beauty of nearby scenery, and the convenience of your local neighborhood.
Come enjoy the benefits of city-life, combined with the rewards of high-class apartment living.
Make Eagle's Brooke in Locust Grove, GA your home, and join our community today.
- Spacious Kitchen w/ Island & Ceramic Backsplash
We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.
There is a pet deposit ($300 non-refundable) for the each pet.
There is no weight limit and aggressive breeds are prohibited.
Exit 216 Make a Right onto N McDonough Rd for 5.9 Mil.
Turn Left on Greenwood Industrial Pkwy.
Community Located on right of Round-about.
